#  Site Coordinators

The role of LTER site coordinator has the most variable set of duties and responsibilities. Activities below may be carried out by a designated site coordintor, by administrative staff at the home institution, or by other LTER personnel, such as infromation managers. We collate the most common set of information and activties here.

##  Communication

The LTER Network Office maintains an email list of site coordinators for inforomation and resource sharing. Traffic is not heavy and your colleagues are a very useful resource. To join (or leave) the list, visit the [**About page**](https://groups.google.com/a/lternet.edu/g/lter-coordinators/about) of the lter-coordinators@lternet.edu google group.
